annotations.description: It's about time that I show you how to make a proper Moscow Mule. Get your first audiobook free when you try Audible for 30 days! Visit http://www.audible.co...
annotations.title: Moscow Mule | How to Drink

textContent:
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Vodka
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Lime Juice
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Ginger Syrup
~ 5 oz. -or- 150 ml. Seltzer
(OR skip the Ginger Syrup+Seltzer Combo in favor of a spicy
ginger beer)

Build in Copper mug with cracked ice
Garnish with lime wedge

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6X0oO5OZzLQ
title: Moscow Mule
